price: Lakini mimi nitawapelekea zawadi, nami nitangoja watakayo rudi nayo wajumbe.
arabic: وَإِنِّي مُرۡسِلَةٌ إِلَيۡهِم بِهَدِيَّةٖ فَنَاظِرَةُۢ بِمَ يَرۡجِعُ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلُونَ
footnotes: Na mimi kwa kupendelea salama na uzima nitampelekea zawadi Sulaiman na kaumu yake, na nitatazama wajumbe watarejea na nini - wataikubali zawadi au watairudisha?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-innī mur'silatun ilayhim bihadiyyatin fanāẓiratun bima yarjiʿu al-mur'salūna
